#SOTEU On my way to give State of the Union speech at EP on how we deliver together for Europe's citizens.Look forward to lively debate/JMB
Speech #SOTEU 2012 starts.! At a time #EU continues to be in crisis...
Europe's crisis not just financial &econ. It is a political crisis, a crisis of confidence #SOTEU
In a democracy there is no political problem without a political solution! #SOTEU
Globalisation demands more European unity. More unity demands more integration. More integration demands more democracy #SOTEU
Not acceptable to present European summits as boxing matches, claiming a KO over a rival #SOTEU
What I demand and what I present to you today is Decisive Deal for #Europe #SOTEU
The idea that we can grow without reform or prosper alone is simply false #SOTEU
Growth is the lifeblood of European social market model, it creates jobs supports our standards of living #SOTEU
A Decisive Deal for Europe – leave no doubt about integrity of the Union and irreversibility of the #euro #SOTEU
Test of credibility for Member States: will see if they only talk about growth or if they are ready to invest in a budget for growth #SOTEU
Some say the European social model is dead. I do not agree #SOTEU
If Greece stands by its commitments, it should stay in #Euro area #SOTEU
Today, @EU_Commission is presenting proposals for single European supervisory mechanism. A quantum leap on a #bankingunion #SOTEU
@EU_Commission will present Blueprint for deepening the economic and monetary union still this autumn #SOTEU #EMU
We cannot continue trying to solve European problems with national solutions #SOTEU
Indeed, we have a real disconnect between political parties in the capitals and the European political parties in Strasbourg #SOTEU
Commission calls on European political parties to present their candidate for the post of Commission President at #EP 2014 elections #SOTEU
Let’s not be afraid of the word: we will need to move towards a federation of nation states.  #SOTEU
Appalling situation in Syria reminds us that we cannot afford to be by-standers #SOTEU
#Europe cannot be technocratic, bureaucratic or diplomatic. It has to be ever more democratic #SOTEU
10/17=27 No one will be forced to come along. And no one will be forced to stay out #SOTEU
Previous generations have overcome bigger challenges. Now it is for this generation to show they are up to the task #SOTEU
Europe has a soul. This soul can give us the strength and the determination to do what we must do #SOTEU
@EU_Commission will present Blueprint for deepening the economic and monetary union still this autumn #SOTEU

I do condemn the cowardly act of attacking the US regulate and the killing of Mr Stevens and the other diplomats.
Condemned the cowardly and criminal act against which the United States Consulate in Benghazi had been attacked and killed the Ambassador and his companions.
RT @LibyanBentBladi: This is a sad day for us Libyans, we've lost an irreplaceable friend who wanted to help the country move forward
Amb. Stevens was a friend of Libya and we are shocked at the attacks on the US Consulate in Benghazi.
I condemn these barbaric acts in the strongest possible terms. This is an attack on America, Libya and free people everywhere.
This attack on the US consulate and the killing of the ambassador and his companions is contrary to the teachings of our true religion and our Islamic values

We held the second meeting of the Azerbaijan-Turkey High-Level Strategic Cooperation Council.
In whole, I can say that Turkish-Azerbaijani relations are developing successfully in all spheres, covering all areas.
There is no disagreement between us - whether we are in international affairs or in bilateral relations.
We talked about the political situation, the processes taking place in the world, and at a meeting in a broad meeting, and exchanged views.
Our countries support each other in all areas and in all international organizations.
We approach all international organizations in a single position and support each other (cont) http://t.co/IrKz0KQU
Today, Turkish-Azerbaijani relations are important not only for the development of bilateral relations, but also on the contrary, http://t.co/mxxBKF21
Our role in the world is growing and our support for each other increases the importance of our countries.
Regarding international issues, of course, the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict (cont) http://t.co/w29HRhuE
The attention to the TANAP project in the international arena shows that Turkey and Azerbaijan are always (cont) http://t.co/tSpZbkVW
Connecting Turkey to Azerbaijan and Georgia, as well as Georgia to Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/DxArm6E1
I am very glad that we discuss all issues in the atmosphere of friendship and brotherhood.
Our relationships are the feelings of the two peoples, and their support for each other.

It should be a "public" debate that the candidate 's assertion is conveyed to the whole citizen, but Prime Minister Noda seems not to be established due to public service hectic schedule and schedule adjustment. Today I will have a meeting with @Laura_Ch president of Costa Rica, on matters of bilateral and regional agendas.
Other topics to be discussed with @Laura_Ch will be the new routes to fight drug trafficking, security and transactional organized crime.
The strategies to be implemented will be discussed in a working table, as well as the mechanisms to increase commercial exchange.

From your visit to Lebanon, you would like to announce to the whole world the importance of our country in its unity and diversity, despite the magnitude of the dangers and difficulties.
We all hope that your visit to our country will be good for our children, including the Christian Orientals, who are rooted in this land since ancient times.
Today, if the Lebanese family welcomes you with all its components, you would like to welcome you with your gratitude and thanks for your special love for Lebanon
